name: shlinkio/shlink
description: A self-hosted and PHP-based URL shortener application with CLI and REST interfaces

ci: @parallel cs stan swagger:validate test:unit:ci test:db:sqlite:ci test:db:postgres test:db:mysql test:db:maria test:db:ms
scripts.test:api:ci: GENERATE_COVERAGE=yes composer test:api && vendor/bin/phpcov merge build/coverage-api --php build/coverage-api.cov && rm build/coverage-api/*.cov
scripts.test:api:pretty: GENERATE_COVERAGE=yes composer test:api && vendor/bin/phpcov merge build/coverage-api --html build/coverage-api/coverage-html && rm build/coverage-api/*.cov
scripts.test:cli:ci: XDEBUG_MODE=coverage GENERATE_COVERAGE=yes composer test:cli && vendor/bin/phpcov merge build/coverage-cli --php build/coverage-cli.cov && rm build/coverage-cli/*.cov
scripts.test:cli:pretty: XDEBUG_MODE=coverage GENERATE_COVERAGE=yes composer test:cli && vendor/bin/phpcov merge build/coverage-cli --html build/coverage-cli/coverage-html && rm build/coverage-cli/*.cov

scripts-descriptions.test:unit:ci: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs unit test suites, generating all needed reports and logs for CI envs</>
scripts-descriptions.test:unit:pretty: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs unit test suites and generates an HTML code coverage report</>
scripts-descriptions.test:db: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs database test suites on a SQLite, MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL and MsSQL</>
scripts-descriptions.test:db:sqlite: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs database test suites on a SQLite database</>
scripts-descriptions.test:db:sqlite:ci: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs database test suites on a SQLite database, generating all needed reports and logs for CI envs</>
scripts-descriptions.test:db:mysql: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs database test suites on a MySQL database</>
scripts-descriptions.test:db:maria: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs database test suites on a MariaDB database</>
scripts-descriptions.test:db:postgres: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs database test suites on a PostgreSQL database</>
scripts-descriptions.test:db:ms: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs database test suites on a Microsoft SQL Server database</>
scripts-descriptions.test:api:ci: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs API test suites, and generates code coverage for CI</>
scripts-descriptions.test:api:pretty: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs API test suites, and generates code coverage in HTML format</>
scripts-descriptions.test:cli:ci: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs CLI test suites, and generates code coverage for CI</>
scripts-descriptions.test:cli:pretty: <fg=blue;options=bold>Runs CLI test suites, and generates code coverage in HTML format</>
scripts-descriptions.swagger:validate: <fg=blue;options=bold>Validates the swagger docs, making sure they fulfil the spec</>
scripts-descriptions.swagger:inline: <fg=blue;options=bold>Inlines swagger docs in a single file</>
scripts-descriptions.clean:dev: <fg=blue;options=bold>Deletes artifacts which are gitignored and could affect dev env</>
